name: pinepods
description: PinePods is a self-hosted podcast management tool for browsing, organizing, and streaming audio content. It features episode tracking, metadata, and a sleek UI for personal use.
features: Podcast subscriptions: Subscribe to podcasts via RSS feeds and automatically receive new episode updates.
Episode streaming: Stream podcast episodes directly in the browser or mobile app without downloading.
Playback controls: Resume playback from where you left off with progress tracking across devices.
Episode downloads: Download episodes for offline listening on mobile devices or desktop.
Search and discovery: Find new podcasts by searching titles, descriptions, and categories.
Playlist creation: Create custom playlists combining episodes from different podcasts.
Listening statistics: Track listening time, favorite podcasts, and episode completion rates.
Multi-user support: Create separate accounts for family members with individual subscriptions and history.
Mobile apps: Native Android app with full feature parity to the web interface.
OPML import/export: Transfer podcast subscriptions between apps using standard OPML format.
Episode notes: View show notes, links, and chapter markers embedded in podcast episodes.
Playback speed: Adjust playback speed from 0.5x to 3x for faster or slower listening.
